ygData.subject: Re: [Spolier] Re: Elf-hide gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: Dude. You either have WAY to much time on your hands, or your a speed freak. No disrespect intended. ... From: Brendan  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Dude. You either have WAY to much time on your hands, or your a speed freak.
No disrespect intended.
-----Original Message-----
From: Brendan <brendan@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 10:02 PM
Subject: [eqbards] [Spolier] Re: Elf-hide gloves


>From: Brendan <brendan@...>
>
>they are indeed on the warden, who hangs out in the jail cells. quick map
>of jail:
> O O
> --------------------------------------------
> | * ---> to mushrooms and shin lord
>O| |---------
> | ---------- |
> | y | y | y |
> | | y | |
> | ---------- |
>O| |----------
> | <--- enter
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-----------
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>
>legend = - and | are walls and the platform in the middle of the room
> ~ is the water
> y are frogloks
> * is the warden
> O are troll prisioners in cells
>the warden is sometimes not there, and will be replaced by a badass
>froglok knight. he's been there for over 50% of the time for me, however.
>notes on the warden: he can invis himself and _fight while invis_. you
>NEED someone who can cast see invis if you are going to go down there. the
>warden can also backstab for 150+dmg, so make sure that everyone is facing
>him at all times.
>the two frogloks on the platform will usually not come if you pull the 2
>frogloks who are on ground level. the only time they have come down was
>when the warden attacked at the same time, so be careful.
>
>>1 more question to add to this thread - how much do these go for? I was
>>lucky enuf to acquire a pair of elf-hide gloves (thank you Lamont :)
>on fennin ro, the gloves typically go for 100pp, and the belts probably a
>bit more, since they seem a little more rare than the gloves. of course,
>the economy on fennin ro is completely out of wack now.
>
>klamot - bard of fennin ro
>
